fundamentals/architecture/gateway.title: Gateway & response times
fundamentals/architecture/gateway.description: Read responses follow typical HTTPS response expectation, but keep in mind that mutation processing (creates & writes) must occur before the data is made available.

fundamentals/architecture/protocol-desig.description: The Tableland protocol operates as a data scaling solution using chain-powered database mutations and a parallel adjacent network.

fundamentals/architecture/table-token.title: TABLE token & identification
fundamentals/architecture/table-token.description: Tables are guaranteed unique across all chains based on a combination of developer and environment defined information.
